v8:item.v8:content: If you're experiencing slow file list loading, try switching to the list view (More actions — More — View mode)
The files are stored in cloud service <link 1>%</>1.
The last file synchronization failed. Possible reasons: cloud service issues, Internet connection issues, or other issues. See the Event log for details.
The last file synchronization failed. Possible reasons: cloud service issues, Internet connection issues, or other issues. See the Event log for details.
Context menu digital signature commands group
Indicates whether the file is digitally signed or encrypted.
Local date and time when the file version was modified.
User who last edited the file.
User who has locked the file for editing.
Date when the author added the file.

Settings.QueryText: SELECT VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS Ref, FALSE AS DeletionMark, 1 AS PictureIndex, CAST("" AS STRING(150)) AS Description, CAST("" AS STRING(10)) AS Extension, CAST("" AS STRING(500)) AS LongDesc, VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS Author, DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) AS CreationDate, VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS WasEditedBy, DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) AS EditDate, DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) AS ChangeDate, 0 AS Size, FALSE AS SignedWithDS, FALSE AS Encrypted, -1 AS SignedEncryptedPictureNumber, FALSE AS FileBeingEdited, FALSE AS CurrentUserEditsFile, FALSE AS AnotherUserEditsFile, FALSE AS StoreVersions, FALSE AS IsFolder, FALSE AS IsInternal, &FileOwner AS FileOwner, UNDEFINED AS BeingEditedBy, UNDEFINED AS EditedByUser FROM Catalog.MetadataObjectIDs AS MetadataObjectIDsOverridable

v8:item.v8:content: Save the file to a computer or another device
Sign the file with a digital signature.
Lock the file and open it for editing.
Save the file and release it in the infobase.
Update from a file on a computer
Save the file with the digital signature.
Import a file from a scanner.
Create a file from a template.
Print with a digital signature stamp.
